meanings.sent1: The greaseproof paper kept the cookies from getting oily.
meanings.sent2: I always use greaseproof liners when baking to prevent sticking.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's cape was made of greaseproof material to protect it from villainous spills.
meanings.sent4: Her resolve was as strong and greaseproof as a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The greaseproof coating on the pan made cleaning up a breeze.

meanings.definition: A material that is resistant to grease or oil.
meanings.sent1: The bakery ordered a new batch of greaseproof for wrapping pastries.
meanings.sent2: I prefer using greaseproof for packaging food items for delivery.
meanings.sent3: The chef's hat was made of greaseproof, ensuring it stayed pristine during cooking.
meanings.sent4: The treasure map was drawn on a piece of ancient greaseproof, revealing hidden clues.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic always kept a roll of greaseproof handy for messy repairs.
